## `changepoint`

### One changepoint

```{r}
library(changepoint)
plot(rlnorm_ts_1)
rlnorm_ts_1 |>
  cpt.meanvar(method = "BinSeg")
rlnorm_ts_1 |>
  cpt.meanvar(method = "SegNeigh", penalty = "BIC")
rlnorm_ts_1 |>
  cpt.meanvar(method = "PELT")
```

```{r}
bench::mark(
  "BinSeg" = rlnorm_ts_1 |>
    cpt.meanvar(method = "BinSeg") |>
    cpts(),
  "SegNeigh" = rlnorm_ts_1 |>
    cpt.meanvar(method = "SegNeigh", penalty = "BIC") |>
    cpts(),
  "PELT" = rlnorm_ts_1 |>
    cpt.meanvar(method = "PELT") |>
    cpts(),
) |>
  arrange(median)
```



### Three changepoints

```{r changepoint, message=FALSE}
plot(rlnorm_ts_3)
list(rlnorm_ts_1, rlnorm_ts_2, rlnorm_ts_3) |>
  lapply(cpt.meanvar, method = "PELT") |>
  str()

rlnorm_ts_3 |>
  cpt.meanvar(method = "PELT") |>
  plot()
```
